place.name: SOMERSAL HERBERT
place.gazetteerText: SOMERSALL-HERBERT, a parish in the district of Uttoxeter and county of Derby: 3 miles E N E of Ut toxeter r. station. Post town, Derby. Acres, 697. Real property, £1,230. Pop., 1 16. Houses, 20. The manor belongs to Lord Vernon. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lichfield. Value, £250.* Patron, Sir Sir W. Fitzherbert, Bart. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
